bgu.csp.az.api.agt
Class SimpleMessage

java.lang.Object
  bgu.csp.az.api.Message
      bgu.csp.az.api.agt.SimpleMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SimpleMessage
extends Message

the message that used by the SimpleAgent - its filled at runtime using annotations. This message can contain any type of content, thus removes the need of building new types of messages for each algorithm.

See Also:
Serialized Form
